text: Add the butter, icing sugar, and milk to a mixing bowl.  Carefully blend the ingredients together thoroughly. Be sure to start off with a low speed first to minimize the dust from the sugar. Stop the mixer occasionally. Use a rubber spatula to push down any mixture from the sides back into the center of the bowl. Add the melted chocolate and chocolate chips. Continue to blend. Use immediately or store in an airtight container.
